pages.page:
I.3. Students cooperate in maintaining the
cleanliness and orderliness of the
classrooms.
The Utility personnel maintains the cleanliness and orderliness of the campus.

When the school year is in Normal situation the
students help to maintaining the cleanliness
and orderliness of the classrooms but for this
school year because of " No face to face" classes
the utility worker maintaining the cleanliness
of the classrooms.
